baseline to 202 per 100,000 at endline. The 
MMR for EmONC facilities declined by 28%, 
from 629 to 453 maternal deaths per 100,000. 
The declines in MMR correlate with 
reductions in the all-facility CFR due to major 
obstetric complications (from 2.6% to 2.0% 
in Uganda and from 3.1% to 2.0% in Zambia), 
which indicates that facilities in SMGL-supported 
districts have improved their quality of care. 
Most of the declines could be attributed to
